page.title: 18RECREATION CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: 53 children(7-11yrs) answered questions about their pastimes. Boys showed little interest in traditional games.Conkers were mentioned 23 times and tig 11. Imaginative games-e.g.cowboys etc were played by only 8 boys.Chess with 13 was the only popular board game.43 played football but there were only 11 cricketers.12 boys enjoy fishing. Girls were more traditional.23 play skipping games,18 tig,18 hide and seek,16 hopscotch and 7 jacks.Few imaginative games- 2 played with dolls,2cowboys.3 played chess but otherwise no interest in board games. 37 children had bicycles;30 had roller skates and 19 had computers. 15 regularly go swimming and 6 ride ponies.An average of16hrs T.V viewing (1980 winter average 24hrs) .Games no longer played-whip& top,marbles,hoops.
